ComicInfo.Title: Fear Stalker; When Calls the Vampire!; This Blood is Mine!; Of Royal Blood!; Look Homeward, Vampire!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Count Dracula takes on Hollywood!
Table of Contents artwork by Rich Buckler and Pablo Marcos. "Fear Stalker" written by Marv Wolfman, penciled by Mike Ploog and inked by Ernie Chua. "In Search of Dracula: A True History of Dracula and Vampire Legends" six page text piece with photos by Chris Claremont reviewing a book by Raymond T. McNally-Radu Florescu. "Transylvania Vacation Spot of Europe?" one page text piece by Dwight R. Decker. "When Calls the Vampire!" Reprinted from Adventures into Terror #10. "This Blood is Mine!" written by Gardner F. Fox, penciled and inked by Dick Ayers. "Dracula Lives! Feature Page: Yes, Marv Wolfman is His Real Name!" one page biography of Marv Wolfman with one photo of Marv Wolfman and a photo of the Wolfman. "The Horror of Dracula" six page text piece with photos by Gerry Boudreau reviewing the film Horror of Dracula starring Christopher Lee. "Of Royal Blood!" Reprinted from Journey into Unknown Worlds #29. "Look Homeward, Vampire!" written by Gerry Conway, penciled and inked by Vicente Alcazar. *Notes* An all Black and White issue. Unknown artwork by Klaus Janson. Editorial Staff: Tony Isabella, Don McGregor, Gerry Conway and Carla Joseph.
